ai-mil7.7.8:1.1_0: “Venerable Sister, what are the four factors of a dragon?”
ai-mil7.7.8:1.2_0: “Great king, there is little baby there.
ai-mil7.7.8:1.3_0: In the same way, a meditator with his own hands, who is like the one who has little dust on his own master.
ai-mil7.7.8:1.4_0: This is the first kind of wealth.
ai-mil7.7.8:2.1_0: Furthermore, the mind bound to Māra’s mind is boundaries.
ai-mil7.7.8:2.2_0: In the same way, the meditator who engages in malicious talebearing on the object opposite objects.
ai-mil7.7.8:2.3_0: This is the second herd of deer.
ai-mil7.7.8:3.1_0: Furthermore, great king, do you know the announcement
ai-mil7.7.8:3.2_0: In the same way, great king, one who practices retreat can know that is the time for retreat ...
ai-mil7.7.8:3.3_0: This is the third way to get hold of a month.
ai-mil7.7.8:4.1_0: Furthermore, a deer-hunter sees a bait of death.
ai-mil7.7.8:4.2_0: In the same way, great king, one who practices like a response, should observe the sabbath on the supreme object: ‘I will go to the supreme object.’
ai-mil7.7.8:4.3_0: This is the fourth way to get hold of a month.
ai-mil7.7.8:4.4_0: The senior monks, having spoken this statement
ai-mil7.7.8:5.2_0: A monk who is resolute should live secluded and heedlessly.
